docs.snippet: The Democratic Party has avoided fighting the legitimacy of Donald Trump’s election. This is a mistake the Republicans would not have committed....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Democratic Party has avoided fighting the legitimacy of Donald Trump’s election. This is a mistake the Republicans would not have committed.
docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by Dahlia Lithwick and Prof David S Cohen criticizes elected Democrats for failing to lend support to legal efforts to bar Pres-elect Donald Trump from assuming office; suggests Republicans would not have been so passive, pointing to 2000 presidential recount as evidence; expresses alarm that Democratic passivity bodes ill for both party and nation during Trump presidency.

headline.main: Buck Up, Democrats, and Fight Like Republicans

byline.original: By DAHLIA LITHWICK and DAVID S. COHEN

docs.snippet: The president-elect isn’t showing much appreciation for facts or science....
docs.lead_paragraph: The president-elect isn’t showing much appreciation for facts or science.
docs.abstract: Thomas L Friedman Op-Ed column underscores how reckless it was for American people to elect Donald Trump, particularly in light of Trump's views on global warming, China and Russia; warns in particular of threat posed by Russia to global stability.
